contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|blocking|block}} {{selfref|For blocking on Wikipedia, please see [[Wikipedia:Blocking policy]].}} '''Blocking''' may refer to: == Telecommunications and computing == *[[Blocking (computing)]], holding up a task until an event occurs *[[Head-of-line blocking]] in some network switching fabrics == Theatre and film == * [[Blocking (stage)]], the movement and positioning of actors on the stage (and in film, within the frame) * [[Blocking (animation)]] == Sport == * [[Blocking (American football)]], the legal interference with another player's motion * [[Blocking (martial arts)]], a defensive technique in martial arts == Behaviour == * [[Thought blocking]], a type of thought disorder * [[Blocking effect]], in psychology == Other == * [[Blocking (textile arts)]], the process of stretching a knitted garment into shape while wet or using steam * [[Blocking (statistics)]], in the design of experiments, the arranging of experimental units in groups (blocks) which are similar to one another * [[Western_blot#Blocking|Blocking]] in western blot, a process to prevent unwanted binding of antibody to the membrane * [[Blocking (construction)]], horizontal boards placed between wall studs to facilitate hardware attachment == See also == * [[Block (disambiguation)]] * [[Non-blocking (disambiguation)]], for computers running multiple programs at once, it is important for no single task waiting for completion of an operation to indefinitely block the processing of any other task {{disambiguation}}
